BushTripInjector.ChangeLog:
0.7.0.931 Feature: Select the Parkingspot inside of BTI. To activate this feature, you must download the Database File for the Parking Positions seperatly from Flightsim.to BTI will calculate Position and Heading for you. 0.7.1.955 User-Req: Enable/Disable loading the flightplan into GPS (Koschi) Feature: Allow Multi-Actions in Events&Triggers Editor Feature: Activate sound files in Events&Triggers (incl. a warning message because of sim bug) GUI: some typos (thanks to Pennsocke) Maint: Parking Database included into UpdateCheck Maint: Context Menu in WorldMap for future features FIX: Fixed a bug when calculating runway heading (true/magnetic), when airport is not in BTI database (cptdev) 0.7.2.962 FEATURE: Parking Selection now with Gate/Ramp Type MAINT: AirportCreation: Optimization of Wizard Steps BUGFIX: Update Check was broken (thanks to Koschi)
0.7.3.981 FEATURE: Let ATC decide the starting runway. ==> Runway must be empty in BTI. FEATURE: Select Mode for Worldmap: Aerial, Aerial with Labels, Road FEATURE: Configure your own map tile server, see .config/example.maps.comfig UPDATE: support for deepl.com app V2.3.1 UPDATE: remove compatibility code to v0.5
